active_learning.discussion_prompt: Compare and contrast traditional SIEM with cloud-native SIEM in terms of scalability, cost, and threat detection capabilities. Which would you recommend for a mid-sized company adopting a multi-cloud strategy, and why? (Encourage debate on real-world trade-offs like vendor lock-in vs. elasticity.)
